issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Refactor UTF8 to Date32 for Performance
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10947](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10947). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After adding benchmarking capability to the UTF8 to Date32/Date64 CAST functions there was opportunity to improve the performance.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10947?focusedCommentId=17252646) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8943
